flawed_nl_solution:
The ones with nuts that they ate was 40% of the box because 80% x 0.5 = 40%
The ones without nuts that they ate equaled 25% of the box because 50% x 0.5 = 25%
They ate 65% of the box because 40 + 25 = <<40+25=65>>65
They left 53% of the box because 100 - 65 = <<100-65=53>>53
The box had 80 chocolates because 28 / 0.35 = <<28/0.35=80>>80
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
